verbs.description: [ARG0: The White House] [V: lashed] out [ARG1: against the Philadelphia Eagles] [ARGM-LOC: in a statement] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] , [ARGM-ADV: saying most of the team abandoned fans by choosing to skip a Super Bowl celebration with President Donald Trump] .
